extensionDescription.message: Let your replies follow their original message!

prefs_OptionText_dest_folder_type_info.message: Choose whether to move the mails to a subfolder or the same folder.

prefs_OptionText_warn_before_run_info.message: Warn the user before running the moving operation.

prefs_OptionText_dest_folder_prefix_info.message: Specify a prefix for the subfolder name where the mails will be moved.

prefs_OptionText_do_only_same_account_in.message: Search for related mail only in the same account.

prefs_OptionText_do_only_sent_info.message: Consider only mails that are sent by the account owner of the considered folder.

prefs_OptionText_do_only_sent_folders_in.message: Consider only folders that are marked as "Sent" type. Otherwise give a warning to the user.

prefs_OptionText_ignore_archive_folders_.message: Do not search for related mails that are in archive folders.

prefs_OptionText_min_moves_to_report.message: Min number of mails moved to report

prefs_OptionText_min_moves_to_report_inf.message: Set the minimum number of mails moved to generate a report in a new tab.

prefs_OptionText_max_messages_moved.message: Max number of mails to move

prefs_OptionText_max_messages_moved_info.message: Set the maximum number of mails to move in a single operation.

prefs_OptionText_do_debug_info.message: Turn on debug mode for additional logging.

TranslateText.message: Do you want to help translate this addon?
